amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Defense should assist the Iraqi Government in destroying the Abu Ghraib prison and replacing it with a modern detention facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-499 to express the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Defense should assist the Iraqi Government in destroying the Abu Ghraib prison and replacing it with a modern detention facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (PA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 308 - 114 (Roll no. 201).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Weldon (PA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weldon (PA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 308 - 114 (Roll no. 201).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
